Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Jon Snow. When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him. I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me. So I prayed to the gods, take him away. Make him die. He got the pox. And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived. A murderer. I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother. A woman he didn't even know. So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live. Let him live and I'll love him. I'll be a mother to him. I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.

I will never see them again.

Sentence: Robb!

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Lord Walder! Lord Walder, enough! Let it end! Please! He is my son! My first son! Let him go and I swear that we will forget this! I swear it by the Old Gods and New! We will take no vengeance.

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: Take me for a hostage but let Robb go! Robb, get up! Get up and walk out! Please! Please!

Name: catelyn stark
Sentence: On my honor as a Tully, on my honor as a Stark, let him go or I will cut your wife's throat!
